author: Special Correspondent
text:
A spotted deer suffered injuries when it was knocked down by a speeding car while crossing the Talaivasal – Veeraganur main road at Vedanayagapuram near Talaivasal on Saturday.

The local people informed the forest department and the veterinary hospital in Talaivasal. Sakthivel, a veterinary doctor from the Talaivasal veterinary dispensary, rushed to the spot and gave first aid to spotted deer. It was then taken for treatment.
title: Spotted deer knocked down by car
